title: Chrome 99 beta tests a new shortcut for downloads, adds handwriting API, and more
content:
Google has just released Chrome 99 on the beta channel, which brings several new improvements and enhancements, including new download workflow, handwriting recognition API, changes to how ad blockers work, and more. Accessing your ongoing downloads or downloaded files on Chrome desktop is a bit of a hassle. This is because the downloads tab is

The post Chrome 99 beta tests a new shortcut for downloads, adds handwriting API, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Chrome 99 beta adds a new download workflow, handwriting recognition API, changes to how ad blockers work, and more.
